title: Ultra small gold nanoclusters supported on two-dimensional bismuth selenium nanosheets for synergistic photothermal and photodynamic tumor therapy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24335-24344
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03142C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chenxi Li, Xueyang Fang, Qingdong Zeng, Li Zeng, Bin Zhang, Guohui Nie
AuNC@Bi2Se3 nanocomposites showed combined near-infrared light-initiated photothermal/photodynamic therapy against tumors, demonstrating their potential as novel theranostic agents for biomedical applications.
